A simple demo for WebSocketClient accesor. The WebSocketClient can be imported from http://www.terraswarm.org/accessors/.
NOTE: This client assumes that there is a web socket server running on the local host. There are two alternative implementations of the server. A Ptolemy II server is provided as a model called WebSocketServer in this same directory by clicking on the link below:

property.name: text
property.value:
Alternatively, there is also a Node.js server, which you can start with: > node NodeServer.js before running this demo. NodeServer.js is in the same demo directory. You may need to install the 'ws' module using something like: > sudo npm install ws
The reply messages from the server appear in the display MessageFromServer, while the current status of the connection appears in the console.
